The play "Julius Caesar" by William Shakespeare, is staged by a group of prisoners from maximum security prison Rebibbia, located in Rome. At the same time it works as documentary record, the fiction works behind the original plot. Directed by brothers Paolo and Vittorio Taviani and winner of the Golden Bear at the Berlin Film Festival 2012.
